code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     ClearIndicesCacheRequest clearIndicesCacheRequest = new ClearIndicesCacheRequest(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(request.param("index"))).     clearIndicesCacheRequest.indicesOptions(IndicesOptions.fromRequest(request, clearIndicesCacheRequest.indicesOptions())).     fromRequest(request, clearIndicesCacheRequest).     return channel -> client.admin().indices().clearCache(clearIndicesCacheRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }

public static ClearIndicesCacheRequest fromRequest(final RestRequest request, ClearIndicesCacheRequest clearIndicesCacheRequest) {     clearIndicesCacheRequest.queryCache(request.paramAsBoolean("query", clearIndicesCacheRequest.queryCache())).     clearIndicesCacheRequest.requestCache(request.paramAsBoolean("request", clearIndicesCacheRequest.requestCache())).     clearIndicesCacheRequest.fieldDataCache(request.paramAsBoolean("fielddata", clearIndicesCacheRequest.fieldDataCache())).     clearIndicesCacheRequest.fields(request.paramAsStringArray("fields", clearIndicesCacheRequest.fields())).     return clearIndicesCacheRequest. }
